data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The idea of generations, and the characteristics that they have, seems a little strange to me. Newspapers ____ always ____ stories ____ how ____ generation ____ so ____ from ____ previous ____. And ____ people ____ on ____ dislike ____ new ____ for ____ being ____ same ____ past ____. To me, people are not so simple that they can be easily described in this way.
data.partBlankContent: The idea of generations, and the characteristics that they have, seems a little strange to me. Newspapers a__ always rele_____ stories ab___ how th__ generation i_ so diff_____ from t__ previous o__. And th__ people g_ on t_ dislike t__ new gener______ for n__ being t__ same a_ past on__. To me, people are not so simple that they can be easily described in this way.
data.answer: 代际的概念，以及他们具有的特征，在我看来有点奇怪。报纸总是报道这一代人与上一代人是如何截然不同的故事。于是人们就开始讨厌新一代，因为新一代和过去一代不同。对我来说，人并不是简单到可以轻易用这种方式来描述的。
